name: All IBAN (no spaces)
description: Matches every country's IBAN without spaces
content:
Based on the IBAN syntax from https://de.wikipedia.org/wiki/IBAN#IBAN-Struktur_in_verschiedenen_L.C3.A4ndern
This is NOT the strictest match. The English Wikipedia article contains more details about where  to expect which charaters for each country's IBAN format. Have a look at the BBAN column here: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/International_Bank_Account_Number#IBAN_formats_by_country

Since RegExr restricts the lenght of the expression, I could not fit the rules for all countries. Six are missing and could be appended to above expression like this:
|(?:^TR[\d]{2}[A-Za-z0-9]{22}$)|(?:^HU[\d]{2}[A-Za-z0-9]{24}$)|(?:^AE[\d]{2}[A-Za-z0-9]{19}$)|(?:^GB[\d]{2}[A-Za-z0-9]{18}$)|(?:^CY[\d]{2}[A-Za-z0-9]{24}$)|(?:^CF[\d]{2}[A-Za-z0-9]{23}$)

I decided to write rules for matching without spaces, because you need to remove the space charecters anyway if you intend to validate the checksum.

I got example IBAN from here: http://www.rbs.co.uk/corporate/international/g0/guide-to-international-business/regulatory-information/iban/iban-example.ashx
